Reaching Soest by train is easy, and the station is very close to the historic old city.

value: The historic old city (Altstadt) is interesting to wander about, and has a number of medieval cathedrals.
It is not far from Soest to Mohnesee (the Mohne dam).  The Sperrmauer (dam wall) was breached during the second World War by RAF bombers in
The Hotel Stadt Soest is a pleasant place to stay and is very close to the railway station.  It is in the old city.
